abstract: iPhone users have felt the sting of high roaming charges with their devices, and many of them are complaining to the company or on blogs.
snippet: iPhone users have felt the sting of high roaming charges with their devices, and many of them are complaining to the company or on blogs.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Sept. 9 — When Neil Dingman recently went on a European vacation, he took his iPhone with him with no intention of using it much. In fact, for the 14 days he was there, he used it only a handful of times and had expected to see just a small increase in his next bill for roaming charges.

headline.main: Fun, Tours and a $3,000 Bill for Hardly Using an iPhone
headline.print_headline: Fun, Tours and a $3,000 Bill For Hardly Using an iPhone
